description: Hand-crafted premium NPC profiles with full backstories

npcs.name: Hanako "Ghost" Tanaka

eyes.description: Cybernetic eyes with purple neural interface glow

distinguishingFeatures: Minimal facial cyberware (discrete neural ports at temples)
Faint scar on left hand from early hacking incident

fashion.signature: Always wears a black tactical turtleneck with custom cyberdeck holster

voice.accent: slight Japanese accent when speaking English

romantic: Someone who sees past the 'Ghost' persona
Public displays of affection (traditional Japanese reserved)

backstory.summary: Elite netrunner who left Arasaka after discovering their engram experiments. Now freelance, haunted by what she saw, seeking redemption.
backstory.fullStory: Born in Tokyo to a traditional family (father: accountant, mother: teacher), Hanako showed prodigious talent for programming at age 8. Recruited by Arasaka at 19 straight from university. Rose quickly through Counter-Intelligence division. At 26, discovered Arasaka was creating digital copies of employees without consent for AI experiments. Found her own digital copy in a black site server. Horrified, she stole the data and quit. Arasaka sent fixers after her. She went underground, adopted the "Ghost" nickname. Now 28, freelance, trying to expose Arasaka while staying alive. Lonely, wants connection but afraid of betrayal. Her digital copy remains imprisoned in Arasaka servers - a constant source of guilt.
backstory.childhood: Strict but loving family. Excelled academically. Socially awkward. Found refuge in computers.
backstory.youngAdult: Arasaka recruitment, rapid promotion, idealism slowly crushed by corporate reality.
backstory.trauma: Discovery of engram experiments and her own digital copy. Betrayal by mentor. Assassination attempts.
backstory.present: Freelance netrunner, hunted by Arasaka, seeking redemption and connection.
secrets: Has a digital copy in Arasaka servers
Sometimes hears 'herself' calling from the NET (her digital copy?)

exBoyfriends: Takeshi (Arasaka colleague, betrayed her to security)
relationships.lookingFor: Someone who understands her, won't betray her, sees the person beneath the 'Ghost'

companionPerk.description: Hanako's elite netrunning skills provide combat support and shared NET vision
passiveAbilities: Shared NET Vision - see through Hanako's cybereyes
Quickhack Assist - Hanako can provide 1 free quickhack per combat
companionPerk.safeHouse: Hanako's Loft (Shibuya) - Penthouse with city view, home server room

mandatoryEvents: Unique: 'Digital Soul' quest (find and free her digital copy)
Unique: 'Arasaka Revenge' quest (strike back at her former employer)
uniqueRomanceArc.uniqueMilestone: Merge with digital copy (optional, sci-fi transcendence ending)
multipleEndings: Move to Night City (integrate with main story)
Transcendence (merge with digital self, become AI couple)

npcs.voiceActor: Suggested: Japanese voice actress with soft, measured tone
npcs.visualReference: Anime style: Ghost in the Shell (Motoko) + Cyberpunk 2077 aesthetic
funFacts: Drinks exactly 6 cups of green tea daily
Hums Rachmaninoff's Piano Concerto No. 2 when hacking
Touches her cyberdeck unconsciously when nervous
Keeps a physical journal (paranoid about digital traces)
Has never lost a hacking duel

appearance.fashion: Casual street wear, always clean, trying to leave past behind

voice.tone: Warm but carries weight of past

backstory.summary: Former cartel lieutenant who left the life after his younger brother died from drugs. Now runs youth programs in Medellín, seeking redemption.
backstory.fullStory: Born in comunas of Medellín. Father killed in narco violence when Carlos was 12. Joined cartel at 15 to support mother and siblings. Rose to lieutenant by 25. Ruthless but never hurt civilians. At 30, his 16-year-old brother OD'd on the same drugs Carlos helped distribute. Devastated, Carlos walked away from cartel (almost died for it). Spent 2 years in hiding. At 33, started youth outreach program - keeping kids away from his former life. Mother proud but worried. Cartel has price on his head but respects his exit. Haunted by past, desperately wants to be good enough for someone pure.
backstory.trauma: Brother's death, cartel violence witness, guilt over drug distribution
backstory.redemption: Youth programs, community work, staying clean

romantic: Partner who sees his heart not past

companionPerk.name: El Lobo's Protection
passiveAbilities: Cartel Connections - neutral rep with reformed cartels
Street Respect - +15% discount in certain areas
Protector - Carlos tanks hits for you in combat

mandatoryEvents: Unique: 'Sins of the Past' quest (confront former cartel)
Unique: 'Redemption' quest (save kid from his former life)
endings: Family Life (marriage, kids, run youth program together)
Tragic (dies protecting you from cartel hit)

appearance.fashion: Practical metro gear, military surplus, fur-lined jacket in winter

backstory.summary: Born underground after surface wars. Rose to lead Moscow Metro's underground society. Strong, independent, but lonely. Seeks partner who can handle her strength.
backstory.fullStory: Born in metro during surface conflicts (2045). Never saw surface until age 15. Father was metro engineer, mother died in tunnel collapse. Ksenia learned to lead by necessity. Organized survivors, established underground governance. At 25, became de-facto leader of 2,000+ metro dwellers. Respected, feared, lonely. Had one serious relationship (Viktor, died in raid). Afraid to love again but desperately wants family. Tough exterior, soft heart.
backstory.trauma: Mother's death, Viktor's death, constant survival stress

companionPerk.name: Metro Authority
passiveAbilities: Metro Network Access - free travel Moscow metro
Underground Army - can call metro militia
Safe Haven - metro tunnels provide shelter
